Package pgrid.core.maintenance.identity

Interface Summary
JoinLeaveProtocol This interface represent the minimum to implement in order to be responsible for the join - leave protocol of P-Grid
MaintenancePolicy This interface represent the minimum to implement in order to be responsible for the maintenance protocol of P-Grid
 

Class Summary
CoFPolicy  
CoUPolicy This class implement the Correct On Use (CoU, Eager) algorithm to do P-Grid maintenance.
IdentityDataItem  
IdentityManager This class represents the GUID manager to map GUIDs of peers to current IP addresses and ports.
IdentityMappingUpdate This class represents an identity mMapping update message.
IdentityMappingUpdater This class is in charge of doing the identity mapping
NoMaintenancePolicy This class is a place holder.
XMLIdentityDataItem This class represents a shared Gridella file.
